conversation.content: Have you considered a policy that includes coverage for critical illnesses common in the Philippines?
Honestly, I haven't given it much thought. But I guess it would be good to have some kind of protection against unexpected medical expenses.

Absolutely, Maria. The Set-for-Life insurance not only offers coverage for unexpected medical costs but also provides a consistent income stream if you’re unable to work due to illness or injury, helping you manage your finances without worry.
I see. That sounds interesting.
Glad to hear that! If you have any more questions or need further clarification on any aspect, feel free to ask. I'm here to help ensure it fits your needs perfectly.
Thank you for your offer.
You're welcome, Maria! Looking forward to assisting you further. Enjoy your coffee!
Thanks, I appreciate it.
You're very welcome! Have a great day.
You too!
Thank you! Take care.
You're welcome!
